meanings.sent1: She conducted microanalyses of the tiny insect under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use microanalyses to study the structure of cells.
meanings.sent3: The detective's microanalyses of the crime scene revealed a hidden clue.
meanings.sent4: Her microanalyses of the painting unveiled intricate brushstrokes.
meanings.sent5: Through microanalyses, the artist discovered imperceptible flaws in the sculpture.

meanings.sent1: Microanalyses in chemistry involve studying individual molecules.
meanings.sent2: Researchers rely on microanalyses to understand the composition of materials.
meanings.sent3: The chef's microanalyses of the recipe ingredients led to a delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: Microanalyses of market trends help businesses make informed decisions.
